metadata.title: USN-6106-1 -- calamares-settings-ubuntu vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that calamares-settings-ubuntu allowed creating the first user with a blank password, contrary to expectations.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6106-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  calamares-settings-ubuntustudio - 1:22.04.4.3 calamares-settings-lubuntu - 1:22.04.4.3 calamares-settings-ubuntu-common - 1:22.04.4.3 No subscription required
